Class CinemaSystem

java.lang.Object
CinemaSystem
public class CinemaSystem extends Object
A system that will create a cinema, initialize the theaters, and create show bookings for customers. However, this will not contain the logic of how the objects work, similar to the Simulator Project.
Version:
2023.05.05
Author:
Max, Nathaniel, and Salvatore

  • Method Details

    • findShows

      public ShowCollection findShows(String day)
      Finds shows being screened on a particular day. Will most often be used to find out what is being shown today.
      Parameters:
      day - the day that the person wants to see a show.
      Returns:
      the list of shows being shown on that day.

    • findShows

      public ShowCollection findShows(Movie movie, String day)
      Finds shows for a particular movie being screened on a particular day.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie that the person wants to see.
      day - the day that the person wants to see the movie.
      Returns:
      the list of shows for that movie being shown on that day.

    • displayShowDetails

      public String displayShowDetails(Show show)
      Displays the details of a particular show.
      Parameters:
      show - the show that details are being displayed for.
      Returns:
      the show's details.

    • acceptReservation

      public boolean acceptReservation(Show show, Theater theater, Row row, ArrayList<Seat> seats)
      Initiates a seat reservation for a show.
      Parameters:
      show - the show that the reservation is for.
      theater - the theater that the customer will be seated in.
      row - the row that the customer will be seated in.
      seats - the seats that the customer will be seated in.
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was successful, and false otherwise.

    • findBooking

      public Booking findBooking(Show show, String phoneNumber)
      Returns the Booking object for a particular show and under a particular phone number.
      Parameters:
      show - the show that the booking is for.
      phoneNumber - the phone number that the booking is under.
      Returns:
      the Booking object.

    • findBookings

      public ArrayList<Booking> findBookings(Show show)
      Returns all Booking objects for a particular show. Will most often be used when a show is canceled.
      Parameters:
      show - the show that the bookings are for.
      Returns:
      the list of Booking objects for the show.

    • createTheater

      public void createTheater(String t)
      Creates a new theater.
      Parameters:
      t - the name of the theater.

    • addShow

      public void addShow(Movie movie, String date, String time)
      Adds a show to showList.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie being shown.
      date - the date of the show.
      time - the time of the show.
